metadata.title: Anime Collection
metadata.description: Comprehensive anime dataset with demographics, genres, studios, and MyAnimeList integration for tracking your anime journey.
metadata.author: R3VISIT

content_type.name: Animes
content_type.description: All the anime that have captured my imagination.

categories.name: Drama
categories.description: Anime focused on emotional storytelling and character development.

categories.name: Sci-Fi
categories.description: Anime featuring science fiction themes and futuristic settings.

categories.name: Horror
categories.description: Anime designed to scare or unsettle the viewer.

categories.name: Thriller
categories.description: Anime with suspenseful and exciting plots.

categories.name: Mystery
categories.description: Anime focused on solving puzzles or uncovering secrets.

categories.name: Psychological
categories.description: Anime exploring the human mind and complex emotions.

tags.name: Shonen
tags.description: Anime targeted at young male audiences with action and adventure

tags.name: Shojo
tags.description: Anime targeted at young female audiences focusing on romance and relationships

tags.name: Seinen
tags.description: Anime targeted at adult men with mature themes and complex narratives

tags.name: Josei
tags.description: Anime targeted at adult women with realistic romance and life situations

tags.name: Kodomomuke
tags.description: Anime specifically created for children with educational content

tags.name: OVA
tags.description: Original Video Animation released directly to home video

tags.name: ONA
tags.description: Original Net Animation released primarily online

tags.name: Movie
tags.description: Feature-length anime films for theatrical release

tags.name: Short-Form
tags.description: Brief anime episodes typically under 15 minutes

tags.name: School Setting
tags.description: Anime set primarily in educational institutions

tags.name: Music-Themed
tags.description: Anime centered around musical performances and artists

tags.name: Fantasy
tags.description: Anime featuring magical worlds and mythical creatures

tags.name: Supernatural
tags.description: Anime involving ghosts, spirits, and otherworldly phenomena

tags.name: Slice of Life
tags.description: Anime depicting everyday life and mundane activities

tags.name: School
tags.description: Anime featuring school life and student experiences

tags.name: Sports
tags.description: Anime focused on athletic competition and team spirit

tags.name: Mecha
tags.description: Anime featuring giant robots and mechanical suits

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Anime about characters transported to alternate worlds

tags.name: Harem
tags.description: Anime where one character is surrounded by multiple love interests

tags.name: Ecchi
tags.description: Anime with mild sexual themes and fan service

tags.name: Yuri
tags.description: Anime featuring romantic relationships between female characters

tags.name: Yaoi
tags.description: Anime featuring romantic relationships between male characters

tags.name: Magical Girl
tags.description: Anime about girls with magical powers fighting evil

tags.name: Historical
tags.description: Anime set in historical periods and past eras

tags.name: Military
tags.description: Anime featuring armed forces and warfare themes

tags.name: Music
tags.description: Anime exploring musical themes and performance arts

tags.name: Parody
tags.description: Anime that satirizes other shows or cultural elements

tags.name: Vampire
tags.description: Anime featuring blood-drinking supernatural creatures

tags.name: Demon
tags.description: Anime involving demonic entities and supernatural evil

tags.name: Ninja
tags.description: Anime featuring stealth warriors and martial arts

tags.name: Samurai
tags.description: Anime about honor-bound Japanese warriors and their code

tags.name: Post-Apocalyptic
tags.description: Anime set after civilization's collapse or destruction

tags.name: Cyberpunk
tags.description: Anime featuring high-tech dystopian futures and hackers

tags.name: Time Travel
tags.description: Anime involving characters moving through different time periods
